channel.title: i am dain
channel.description: Daniel Demmel's personal website with thoughts about technology and more

item.title: Safely access your home NAS anywhere with an OpenVPN server on GCP
item.description: How to run a low cost OpenVPN server on GCP to access your NAS anywhere even if your home internet is on a shared IP.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Give app servers a REST – CDNs and APIs are the new LAMP
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Why & how Github should have binary diffs
item.description: To make Git (and Github) more useful for collaboration on non-textual content
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Finding an affordable electric family cargo bike in London
item.description: Out with the cars, in with the cargo trikes
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Indiewebify yourself
item.description: Take control back from silos to make the Web personal and open again
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Why YOU — not Henry Ford — should design your working life
item.description: Your life was designed 150 years ago
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel

item.title: Build your Minimum Viable Product
item.description: The first iteration of a product should be about learning

item.description: The first iteration of a product should be about learning

item.title: Getting Cross-origin resource sharing with complex jQuery AJAX requests
item.description: CORS can be tricky, especially if you need to do something beyond the basics like authorisation or custom headers.

item.title: On the fragile relationship between nature conservation and economic growth
item.description: Including the shocking loss of biodiversity around the World through audio recordings of wildlife

item.title: Setting up rmate with Sublime Text for remote file editing over SSH
item.description: Instead of terminal editors with steep learning curve, this guide helps you to tunnel Sublime Text in to your server for remote editing. With sudo!
item.dc:creator: Daniel Demmel
